home.downloadAppDesc2: Enable your team to hire freelancers to meet their skill requirements. Create the right hiring model for your company's workflow. Collaborate with your team on managing projects and freelancers from one place.

home.whyYenjzDesc: Because it combines ease and professionalism.
home.findFreelancersYouNeed: Find Professional Freelancers in All Fields.
home.coverAllYourNeeds: Cover all your skill needs in every specialty.
home.joinYnjezDesc: Be part of a thriving network of professionals and clients. Whether you're a freelancer looking for new opportunities or a company needing skilled experts, Ynjez connects you with the right people to get the job done.

I have over 5 years of experience in designing and developing websites and have worked on all kinds of web projects (E-commerce - Portfolio - Educational - Employment). We have worked with various types of companies and organizations (Small companies - Large companies - Government organizations). I can convert PSD, XD, or Figma designs into interactive websites. Just take a look at my work and don't hesitate to contact me :)

whyYenjz.desc1: Whatever your skills or experience, you will find opportunities that suit you on Ynjez. Discover projects that match your abilities and start working on what you love.
whyYenjz.desc2: Ynjez offers everything you need in one place, from finding opportunities to managing projects and receiving payments. No need to search multiple sites; everything is easily available to you.
whyYenjz.desc3: If you face any challenges, our customer support team is here to help you at any time. We are committed to providing the necessary support to ensure a hassle-free experience.
whyYenjz.desc4: With Ynjez, you can manage your projects effortlessly. Track progress, communicate with your team, and assign tasks with just a click, ensuring smooth workflow.
whyYenjz.desc5: We care about protecting your rights. Whether you are a freelancer or a client, Ynjez ensures safety and reliability through strict terms of use and a dispute resolution system.
whyYenjz.desc6: Our rating system helps you build your reputation based on real performance. The more positive reviews you receive, the higher your chances of getting new projects.

howItWorks.desc1: Create a free account on Yngez in minutes. Enter your basic information and start customizing your profile.
howItWorks.desc2: Clearly showcase your skills and experience on your profile. The more accurate your information, the higher your chances of attracting the right clients.
howItWorks.desc3: Whatever your skills or experience, you'll find opportunities that suit you on Yngez. Discover projects that match your abilities and start working on what you love.
howItWorks.desc4: Prepare professional proposals that demonstrate how you can achieve the client's goals. Make sure your proposal highlights your strengths and explains how you will add value to the project.
howItWorks.desc5: Once your proposal is accepted, communicate with the client and set the details. Work hard and professionally to achieve the agreed-upon results.
howItWorks.desc6: After completing the project, make sure to request a review from the client. Positive reviews help you build a strong reputation and increase your chances of landing future projects.

footer.about: Welcome to the largest Arabic marketplace for buying and selling microservices. We are here to help you achieve your goals easily and securely. You can rely on our platform to complete your tasks and projects at prices that suit you.

hero.title: Hire freelancers and manage your company's projects from one place
hero.desc: Enable your team to participate in hiring freelancers through the largest freelance platform in the Arab world

benefits.title: How Hiring Freelancers Benefits Your Company and Team
benefits.item1: Lower costs and faster turnaround compared to traditional hiring
benefits.item2: Access to specialized skills as needed
benefits.item3: Work with the best talents and experts across the Arab world
benefits.item4: Increase your team's productivity and achieve desired goals
benefits.item5: Complete projects at lower costs with high quality and in record time

about.title: What Is Yinjaz for Enterprises?
about.desc1: A customized solution for companies and organizations to meet their specialized skill needs by creating an enterprise account on Ynjez, adding team members to participate in hiring freelancers and managing projects. Team members can collaborate by assigning projects among themselves and sharing feedback.
about.desc2: As an enterprise owner, you can control hiring permissions for your teams and oversee project execution from a single platform. You can also monitor the organization's unified balance to track spending and manage financial transactions effectively.

step1.title: Create Your Enterprise
step1.desc: Add your company information and create an enterprise account for free using your existing Yinjaz account.

step2.title: Add Your Team
step2.desc: Invite your company's team members to the enterprise, create different teams, and assign the appropriate permissions to each team.

step3.title: Manage Your Enterprise Projects
step3.desc: Add projects within the enterprise and take advantage of project management features to collaborate with your team, monitor progress, and delegate tasks.

features.title: Manage your teams and projects from one place
features.desc: All the features you need to complete your organization's projects in the best way

projects.title: Projects Management
projects.desc: Track projects posted by you or members in your organization and collaborate with them to manage and supervise their execution until delivery.

members.title: Team Management
members.desc: Add team members to your organization and assign them different roles and permissions to help manage projects efficiently.

finances.title: Financial Management
finances.desc: Monitor your organization's spending, track project budgets, and manage payments to freelancers all in one place.

collaboration.title: Team Collaboration
collaboration.desc: Enable seamless communication between team members and freelancers with built-in messaging and file sharing tools.

reports.title: Reports and Analytics
reports.desc: Get detailed insights about your projects, team performance, and spending with comprehensive reports and analytics.

questions.q2: How do I create an enterprise account?
questions.q3: Can I add team members to my enterprise?
questions.q4: How does billing work for enterprises?
questions.q5: Is there a limit to the number of projects I can manage?

answers.a1: Ynjez for Enterprises is a customized solution for companies and organizations to meet their specialized skill needs by creating an enterprise account, adding team members, and collaborating on hiring freelancers and managing projects from one place.
answers.a2: You can create an enterprise account for free using your existing Ynjez account. Simply navigate to the enterprise section, add your company information, and follow the setup instructions.
answers.a3: Yes, you can invite your company's team members to join your enterprise. You can create different teams, assign appropriate permissions, and collaborate on projects together.
answers.a4: Enterprises have a unified balance that can be monitored to track spending across all projects. You can manage financial transactions, set budgets, and control who has permission to hire freelancers.
answers.a5: No, there is no limit to the number of projects you can manage within your enterprise account. You can create and manage as many projects as needed for your organization.

footer.title: Are you ready to create your enterprise?
